title: S3 Ep127: Snitch on The Toast!: Wednesday, July 22nd, 2020
itunes:title: Snitch on The Toast!: Wednesday, July 22nd, 2020
description:
• Kanye West says he’s trying to divorce Kim Kardashian in latest Twitter rant (Page Six)
  • Christian Cowan calls out Khloé Kardashian for selling loaned dress (Page Six)
  • Jamie Lynn Spears Defends ‘Badass’ Sister Britney Spears Ahead of Conservatorship Hearing (Us Weekly)
  • Natalie Portman, Serena Williams and More Stars Are Bringing National Women's Soccer League Team to L.A. (E! News)
  • Katy Perry, Taylor Swift ended feud publicly to be an ‘example of redemption’ (Page Six)
Dear Toasters Advice Segment
Breaking News: Kim Kardashian West Statement on Kanye West

The Morning Toast with Claudia (@girlwithnojob) and Margo Oshry (@margoshry)
